name: Sticky Web
effect: Sets up Sticky Webs on the opponent's battlefield, which triggers every time a victim switches targets from the one they had on the previous turn. When triggered, roll 3 chance dice to lower the victim's Dexterity by 1. This effect can trigger multiple times, but cannot bring a pokemon below a -3 dex modifier. Has no effect on Flying types or Pokemon with the ability Levitate.
description: The pokemon sets up a layer of sticky webs, which irritatingly cling to fur, and scales, making it much harder to move around.
